name: The Brightest Medal
description:
Developed for the 2018.1 IFRJAM

Synopsis

An adventurous Girl Scout goes in search of her last medal in order to obtain her last special medal, she must obtain all of the four special medals of the Girl Scouts, the Walnut, The Cave, The Feather, and The Bonfire.

To complete her goals she ends up borrowing a magic boomerang that was being guarded by the gnomes, now she needs to complete her objectives by escaping from frantic scouts, evil gnomes (or almost), and rabid forest animals.

— DATE
April, 2018

— DEVELOPMENT TEAM 

Me(Producer, Programmer)
Vitor Rodrigues (3D Artist)
Alberto Gregório(2D Artist)
Letícia Sandré(Artist & Game Design)

The game is in Portuguese.
